content: beginner friendly this project details instructions for a tangerine bucket hat for a labubu it is worked in joint rounds materials include 5mm & 2mm hooks yarns of choice scissors and a sewing needle the 2mm hook is used to make the stem while the 5mm hook is used for the hat i used two main colors orange and green my finished project measured approximately 4 5 in x 3 5 in i used less than a skein of yarn for each - this is a great way to utilize scrap yarn the measurements for each differ depending on your choice of yarn and hook size contact me on my instagram @chamomilewonders for any questions and crochet-related feed happy crocheting ♡
